pages.body:
# Decentralized | [[Internet]]

A decentralized network is a network where there is no centralized point of access (unlike traditional networks with clients and servers) and therefore no single point of failure. In a decentralized network, files are distributed by multiple users, rather than solely the owner of those files.

* [[Dat Project]]
* [[Freenet]]
* [[I2P]]
* [[IPFS]]
* [[Loki Network]]
* [[Maidsafe]]
* [[Project Maelstrom]]
* [[Solid]]
* [[ZeroNet]]
